column1: '''Glingal''' was the tree made by [[Turgon]] of gold in his royal courts of [[Gondolin]] in memory of [[Laurelin]]
column2: one of the [[Two Trees of Valinor]]. Its mate was [[Belthil]].<ref>{{S|15}}</ref><ref>{{HM|PM}}

column1: Glingal is [[Sindarin]] and it means "Hanging Flame".<ref>{{S|Index}}</ref>
[[Robert Foster]] additionally suggests the translation "gleaming light".<ref>{{HM|Guide}}
